Uses of Class
common.test.Question

Packages that use Question 
Package Description
common.test
Data structures for holding test information

  • Uses of Question in common.test

    Subclasses of Question in common.test 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  LongAnswerQuestion
    Represents a question which is responded to with a long form answer and graded manually
    class  MultipartQuestion
    Represents a question made up of multiple sub-questions
    class  MultipleChoiceQuestion
    Represents a question for which the user can select one (or more) answers from a list
    class  NetMultipleChoiceQuestion
    Represents a MultipleChoiceQuestion which is stripped of all correct answer information
    class  NetQuestion
    Represents a Question which does not contain any correct answer information
    class  NetShortAnswerQuestion
    Represents a ShortAnswerQuestion which is stripped of all correct answer information
    class  ShortAnswerQuestion
    Represents a question which is intended to have a short answer and is optionally graded automatically
    Fields in common.test with type parameters of type Question 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.function.Function<Question,​NetQuestion> Test.questionConverter
    A Function converting Questions to their corresponding NetQuestion equivalents
    Methods in common.test that return types with arguments of type Question 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Question> NetTest.getQuestions()
    Retrieves a copy of the internal array of questions
    java.util.ArrayList<Question> Test.getQuestions()
    Retrieves a copy of the internal array of questions
    java.util.ArrayList<Question> MultipartQuestion.getSubQuestions()
    Retrieves a copy of the internal array of sub-questions
    Constructors in common.test with parameters of type Question 
    Constructor Description

    Creates a new MultipartQuestion
